scripts.setup: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then python3 -m venv .venv; fi && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.lint: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then echo 'Error: Backend virtual environment not found. Run "pnpm setup" first.'; exit 1; fi && .venv/bin/ruff check .
scripts.lint:fix: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then echo 'Error: Backend virtual environment not found. Run "pnpm setup" first.'; exit 1; fi && .venv/bin/ruff check --fix .
scripts.format: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then echo 'Error: Backend virtual environment not found. Run "pnpm setup" first.'; exit 1; fi && .venv/bin/ruff format .
scripts.format:check: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then echo 'Error: Backend virtual environment not found. Run "pnpm setup" first.'; exit 1; fi && .venv/bin/ruff format --check .
scripts.check: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then echo 'Error: Backend virtual environment not found. Run "pnpm setup" first.'; exit 1; fi && .venv/bin/ruff check . && .venv/bin/ruff format --check .
scripts.check:fix: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then echo 'Error: Backend virtual environment not found. Run "pnpm setup" first.'; exit 1; fi && .venv/bin/ruff check --fix . && .venv/bin/ruff format .
scripts.type-check: if [ ! -d .venv ]; then echo 'Error: Backend virtual environment not found. Run "pnpm setup" first.'; exit 1; fi && .venv/bin/mypy app || true
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -r {} + 2>/dev/null || true; find . -type f -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null || true; rm -rf .venv
